title: Instructional Design Strategies for Enhancing School Readiness in Dual-Language Learning Children (Simulation/VR-Based)

context.prior_knowledge: Child development theories, basic bilingual learning, and intermediate language education methodologies
context.additional_context: Explicit instruction aligned with developmental stages in VR simulations, integrating cultural/linguistic responsive strategies into project development

learning_goals: Learners can design school readiness assessment tools by analyzing cognitive and linguistic characteristics of dual-language children at different developmental stages
Learners can develop three or more language education scenarios applying explicit instruction in VR simulation environments
Learners can integrate and evaluate culturally and linguistically diverse educational materials in project formats
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
